document.full_text: at least five people were killed when a roadside bomb hit a bus carrying employees of the pakistan navy in the southern port city of karachi, a senior naval officer said.
document.title: asia: roadside bomb in karachi hits navy bus
lines_and_colors: at least five people were killed when a roadside bomb hit a bus carrying employees of the pakistan navy in the southern port city of karachi, a senior naval officer said.
